Package nl.inl.blacklab.indexers

DocIndexer classes for several input formats.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocIndexerAlto
    Index a Alto (OCR'ed text) file.
    DocIndexerFolia
    Index a FoLiA file.
    DocIndexerOpenSonar
    Index a FoLiA file.
    DocIndexerPageXml
    Index a PageXML (OCR'ed text) file.
    DocIndexerTei
    Index a TEI P4/P5 file.
    DocIndexerTeiBase
    Index a TEI P4/P5 file.
    DocIndexerTeiP4 Deprecated
    use DocIndexerTei, which supports (basic) P4 and P5
    DocIndexerTeiPosInFunctionAttr
    Index a TEI P4/P5 file with the PoS in the "function" attribute.
    DocIndexerTeiText
    Index a TEI P4/P5 file, using the <text> element instead of the <body> element as the main content element.
    DocIndexerWhiteLab2
    Index a FoLiA file for WhiteLab 2.0.
    DocIndexerXmlSketch
    Index a Sketch XML file.
    MetadataFetcherCgnImdi
    Example of a metadata fetcher, a class used to fetch metadata from an external source in case it's not included in the documents.
    MetadataFetcherCsv
    Metadata fetcher for csv files.
    MetadataFetcherKbDpo
    Metadata fetcher for KB DPO metadata.
    MetadataFetcherKbDpo.GetKbMetadata
    Retrieve metadata from KB.
    MetadataFetcherKbDpo.GetKbMetadata.Metadata  
    MetadataFetcherSonarCmdi
    Example of a metadata fetcher, a class used to fetch metadata from an external source in case it's not included in the documents.

Package nl.inl.blacklab.indexers Description

DocIndexer classes for several input formats.
